sentences.en: The introduction presents arpeggios on the harp against a string tremolo -- an enchanting sonority.
sentences.cn: 引子,在弦乐的震音上竖琴奏出了琶音,一种迷人的音响.

sentences.en: The lower strings contribute a splendid richness of sonority.
sentences.cn: 下弦能够产生雄壮浑厚的音响效果。

sentences.en: Vowels possess greater sonority than consonants.

words.tran_cn: 响亮的；作响的；能发出响亮声音的

trans.tran_en: The sonority of a sound is its deep, rich quality
